content.rendered:
25% OFF for Teachers!

For Teacher Appreciation Week, the 25% discount on used books and educational toys continues for teachers (including homeschoolers) through SATURDAY! Must be a full-time teacher in charge of a K3-12 class.

 

Discounted Aviation Toys

We’ve discounted our airplane toys! Sold exclusively at our store on Russell Parkway, these airplanes are great gifts for young aviation enthusiasts.

 

Upcoming Summer Activities

Stay tuned to our newsletter or Facebook page for announcements about summer activities at Gottwals Books! We will be hosting Kids Corner again this year, an event where members of our community come in each week to read to children. We will also be doing a summer reading CHALLENGE.

excerpt.rendered: For Teacher Appreciation Week, the 25% discount on used books and educational toys continues for teachers (including homeschoolers) through SATURDAY!
